page.title: 17Alan Hunkin's Day.
page.content: 8.15am. Get up, have breakfast then wait outside for school minibus. 8.45am. Arrive at school. 9.00am. Called into class. Silent reading. spellings, tables etc. 10.00am. English working from texts. 10.30am. Break time in playground. 10.45am. Math's lesson. 11.40am. School assembly. 12.00noon. I have a packed lunch of : an apple, a pie and a packet of crisps. Then outside to play. 1.15pm. Science, computer,craft or topic work, sometimes in groups. 2.15pm. Break time in play ground. 2.30pm. Continue lessons. 3.15pm. Minibus takes me home.I watch T.V.,I often video tape a science fiction series that is on late at night so I can watch it another day. I often play with Kevin a neighbour. 9.00pm. I go to bed.
